title: 求助！联机mod用不了？
author: dco0203
txt_content: 求助  刚弄了一个武器mod 网址：1.0 武器mod 单人模式里有效  可是在联机模式里  合成不了.   版本是1.0  服务器也是我开的  求助！

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
唉, 直接看官網說明吧... 
http://www.minecraftforum.net/to ... od-v84-multiplayer/

Installation

Client SSP

    Backup your minecraft.jar.
    Requires Risugami's ModLoader and Minecraft Forge, so first install those.
    Copy all the files in the Files for mods folder folder, to the .minecraft/mods/ folder.
    This includes the zip with the class files and the properties file.
    (Optional) Install the HD textures to put them in your texture pack in the right folders or replace them with the standard ones in the WeaponMod.zip.
    Enjoy!



Client SMP

    Backup your minecraft.jar.
    Requires Risugami's ModLoader, ModLoaderMP and Minecraft Forge, so first install those.
    Copy all the files in the Files for mods folder folder, to the .minecraft/mods/ folder.
    This includes the zip with the class files and the properties file.
    Recieve a properties file from the server you are going to play on and use it.
    (Optional) Install the HD textures to put them in your texture pack in the right folders or replace them with the standard ones in the WeaponMod.zip.
    Enjoy!



Server

    Backup your minecraft_server.jar.
    Requires ModLoaderMP and Minecraft Forge, so first install those.
    Copy all the files in the Files for mods folder folder, to the <server dir>/mods/ folder.
    This includes the zip with the class files and the properties file.
    Edit the properties file, give each item and entity a different ID. Send the properties file to all your clients.
    Enjoy the massive destruction on your server!

replies.author: john180
replies.txt_content: 你得在服务器里也装上武器mod才能用
